caption: Comfortable seating and friendly staff.  Many items in the menu are not currently available. It would be better if customers were informed of this when given the menu rather than told afterwards that what they are ordering is not possible. Nonetheless, the food is well prepared, well presented, and there's swift service with a smile. Family friendly; accommodating for children.
Thank you so much for a very delicious food and most important excellent service. We have felt like back home. Hope to see you next time we are on holiday. Greetings from Englandüëçüëç
Nice Armenia restaurant, excellent food, excellent costumers service.

Everything is perfect, everything is perfect and everything is prepared with love, this is evident in the design and taste, I recommend it to everyone and I am very happy that finally a real kebab master has appeared in Paris. We really liked the kebab. and the fish and the lula kebab, everything was perfectly juicy, delicious and we asked for more and my guests were delighted with the Armenian cuisine, they didn't even know that fish could be so tasty and meat so juicy cooked on the grill

I came for lunch on a Sunday afternoon and I was particularly well received, I felt good even though I was alone. The portions are generous, the food is tasty and the prices are affordable. The service is very attentive and the staff is very kind. I highly recommend

My family and I went there twice, the first time it was very tasty, juicy and just melted in your mouth, and the design is worthy of praise, and the second time there was probably another chef, we didn't like it there.    there was no design and it was raw.     I thank this chef, who makes a beautiful design and very tasty cuisine, unfortunately I don't know his name, I would ask the administrator to tell me the name of the cook, and they also have the most delicious sauce in the world, I loved the white sauce so much that I even asked to take it with me.
We went there for a birthday, everything went very well. Warm welcome especially Giulia and with wonderful cuisine Thank you so much !

horrible and very poor restaurant, we registered a table for two girls' birthday, we arrived and there were already other people there.. we were refused even though everything was registered! It's good that we haven't paid yet. they said there was another room with a balcony nearby and when we went there we were horrified. it was like we were sitting separately and they were sitting and having fun.. they accepted those who paid more than us.. don't go thereü§Æü§Æü§Æüôè

Very disappointed by the service, we were obliged to re-specify the accompaniment of the dish, the portion of rice was very disappointing, a portion of one tablespoon. Overall the prices are not at their fair value, not recommended üòï

Super good Armenian restaurant, I ate excellent grilled meat with original accompaniments, you can feel the quality of all the products, the originality of the dishes and the magnificent taste of the seasonings typical of this cuisine. I really advise you to stop by their place to taste one of their specialties.

Good time. Franco-Armenian Restaurant. Good choices, grilled meats prepared Armenian style. Friendly and pleasant team. Fair prices, good location, close to Maison Alfort - Alfortville station. Possibility of deliveries.
The welcome is warm. I had salmon and rice pilaf. My friend, a chicken skewer. A real treat! This is a good place to discover Armenian cuisine. Good value for money.

The staff is very kind and professional but pay 15.50e for salmon which is clearly frozen with 1 spoon of rice as an accompaniment... We leave the restaurant still hungry unfortunately. The quality/price ratio is really not there, too bad.

We were there 2 months ago, we didn‚Äôt like the kebabs, they were tough, very small portions, my friends and I decided not to go there again, but our friends invited us a week ago, we ordered kebabs again this time it was just a delight, there is nothing like this anywhere in Paris, kebabs are soft, juicy and very tasty design is simply mesmerizing, probably they changed the cook there, but I recommend everyone to go there, a large portion of kebab plus French fries and two sauces, red and orange sauce orange just a delight the taste is unforgettable my friends and I took a lot of pictures of the dishes we didn‚Äôt want to spoil the design thanks to the cook we will definitely be back keep it upüëçüëçüëç
Very good cuisine, very nice welcome and beautiful setting
the worst restaurant. a table was reserved for a birthday party. in the end the restaurant was closed for other people's birthdays. spoke disrespectfully and didn't even apologize!
Very good restaurant! I recommend 100%, the meat is fresh and cooked on a spit and the welcome is impeccable. It‚Äôs really delicious üá¶üá≤‚ú®
Good restaurant. The specialties are good, but not just these. The Hamburger is also good. The deserts are very good.

4th time I've been there and it's still so good! The dishes are tasty and generous. This restaurant is the guarantee of a great, warm and friendly welcome. Finally, the atmosphere is really great! Well done to the whole team, I highly recommend!

We celebrated our wedding in this restaurant it was the happiest day of our lives everything was perfect the food the atmosphere the singer the service and especially the cake. We thank the staff for their kindness and their organization, everything was perfect, thank you everyone for their welcome. We certainly don't forget the singer too Thank you all.
Excellent restaurant! It‚Äôs nice to find the best of Armenian cuisine. Impeccable welcome, service, taste and quality of dishes. THANKS !

I recently had the pleasure of discovering this restaurant, and I must say that it was an exceptional gastronomic experience, especially for fans of Armenian cuisine. If you are looking for a place to experience authentic Armenian cuisine, look no further than ‚ÄúLe Jardin d‚ÄôErevan‚Äù restaurant. You will find a memorable culinary experience, full of tradition and generosity!
Very good restaurant ideal for discovering Armenian gastronomy. Super quality chicken skewers are delicious.

We were guests from Germany and were thrilled. The quality a local Armenian expects.  Positively surprised by the low prices for Paris standards. The grill is awesome. But also the large selection of food.  Always worth a visit when you are in Paris.
I highly recommend this restaurant. Friendly, warm and above all dishes with lots of flavors. The service is also good.

If you want to experience authentic Armenian cuisine, then this is the ideal place. That was two years ago. Today, 07/20/2024, my wife and I no longer recognize the cuisine offered in this restaurant. Their beef stroganoff from before was a benchmark. The plate that I had in front of me this evening was no longer a beef stroganoff but a kind of tasteless tamboille that I immediately stopped eating and asked for an exchange of dishes. In this case a skewer of ground beef, super salty, served with two sauces, which are no longer homemade...etc..etc. What a shame! For the note, I add that on their menu it is clearly specified that all dishes are accompanied by a green salad or rice pilaf, or fries and also fresh pasta. We ask the waitress for a rice pilaf for my wife, I choose fries. She tells us that it will be an extra charge of 2 euros for each side dish, which is not specified on the menu. We will not pay these so-called supplements. As a drink, I choose a Georgian lemonade from the menu at 4.50 euros for a 50 cl bottle. I am served a 33 cl bottle. On the bill this lemonade is charged at 4.50 euros, the waitress telling us that it is an error on the menu. We are not ready to set foot in this restaurant again.
Very nice discovery of Armenian food Very friendly staff and ready to advise if necessary
A terrible restaurant with the waitress's eyes rolling to the sky.

Simply wonderful! The welcome, the service and above all the food!! It's simple, take whatever you want on the menu, you can't go wrong, everything is delicious!! The meat, the tender fish, well cooked, well seasoned... a real killer!  The manager is a real cream, I 200% recommend going there with your eyes closed, even if the area is quiet, a little out of the way, you won't regret it. In this restaurant you really get what you pay for.

It used to be a great restaurant. Full even at midday. I came back after 3 years... how horrified she was to have come across this totally incompetent and unpleasant waitress who absolutely doesn't make you want to come back. She was absolutely rude all lunch. Taking orders at a terrible price. She responds very badly. Do not look for a solution to satisfy the customer. Lunch menu at ‚Ç¨14.90 dessert with 3 flavors of lemon coconut mango ice cream when we ask for a coffee instead she rolls her eyes and replies that's how it is and not otherwise... honestly I understand better why the restaurant was empty to 1 p.m. on a weekday. At this rate if she stays they will shut down because she is just incompetent. I asked her her name because I told her I would do a Google review and she started laughing and telling me I don't care about your opinion. Absolutely unprofessional. Good luck to this young girl in another field.

Initially very well received. Then another woman arrives, unpleasant, unwelcoming, cold. I don't think I'll come back because I'm disappointed with this behavior. However, the good smells that emerge there make you want to. The dishes were good and plentiful. Order, it will save you from bothering this person.
